thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value
thread.title_full: Great value - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: douglasf586
title: Great value
text: Nicely done - very functional and great location. Room quiet. Great breakfast, which is extremely convenient. I will go back. Parking garage not owned by hotel, and garage is not accommodating when I have parked there in the past. Friends had a similar surprise. Hotel advertises valet parking, but it is self-parking down the street. Anytime over initial day is a full $45 additional charge.
